data.name: About Face
data.oracle_text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The overconfident are the most vulnerable.

data.name: Academic Dispute
data.oracle_text:
Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have it gain reach until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "I'll show you original research, you hack!"

data.name: Active Volcano
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target blue permanent.
• Return target Island to its owner's hand.

data.name: Agent of Stromgald
data.oracle_text: {R}: Add {B}.
data.flavor_text:
"The Order of Stromgald spreads its poisonous lies from within Varchild's troops, and still she sees only visions of conquest."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

data.name: Akki Avalanchers
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Akki Avalanchers gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
data.flavor_text: Among Godo's hordes, "beware of falling rocks" came to mean "akki live nearby."

data.name: Akoum Hellhound
data.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellhound gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Hellhound packs roam the Spikefields, basking in the harsh sunlight and lighting the night with their flames.

data.name: Akroan Crusader
data.oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.
data.flavor_text: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

data.name: Ali Baba
data.oracle_text: {R}: Tap target Wall.
data.flavor_text:
"When he reached the entrance of the cavern, he pronounced the words, 'Open, Sesame!'"
—*The Arabian Nights*, Junior Classics trans.

data.name: Alpine Moon
data.oracle_text:
As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name.
Lands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
data.flavor_text:
"A rare and fascinating phenomenon."
—Tamiyo

data.name: Ancestral Anger
data.oracle_text:
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Ancestral Anger in your graveyard.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "One vampire for every family member I've lost."

data.name: Armorer Guildmage
data.oracle_text:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
Zhalfir's destiny rings in tempered steel.
—Armorer Guild maxim

data.name: Artifact Blast
data.oracle_text: Counter target artifact spell.
data.flavor_text: The first line of defense against Urza and Mishra, the Artifact Blast achieved widespread fame until an unlucky mage discovered it was useless on the devices the brothers had already created.

data.name: Assault Strobe
data.oracle_text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
data.flavor_text: When breaking someone's face once just isn't enough.

data.name: Balduvian Rage
data.oracle_text:
Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
data.flavor_text:
"Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks."
—Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

data.name: Banefire
data.oracle_text:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
data.flavor_text: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

data.name: Banners Raised
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: After the destruction of the Helvault, fearful mobs soon became fearless battalions.

data.name: Barbarian Class
data.oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.
{1}{R}: Level 2
Whenever you roll one or more dice, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Level 3
Creatures you control have haste.

data.name: Barge In
data.oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each attacking non-Human creature gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The giant had heard of locks, but he had yet to discover a door he couldn't open.

data.name: Barrage of Expendables
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition.

data.name: Bellows Lizard
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

data.name: Blaze
data.oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

data.name: Blazing Rootwalla
data.oracle_text:
{R}: Blazing Rootwalla gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Blazing Salvo
data.oracle_text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.
data.flavor_text: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

data.name: Blazing Volley
data.oracle_text: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
data.flavor_text:
"Don't ask me what to do if you miss. They're stingdrakes. Don't miss."
—Orthion, Lavabrink captain

data.name: Blinding Flare
data.oracle_text:
Strive — This spell costs {R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures can't block this turn.

data.name: Blistercoil Weird
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Blistercoil Weird gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.
data.flavor_text: Azorius lawmages would like to outlaw the creation of weirds, but first they'd have to settle their long-standing debate on how to classify them.

data.name: Blisterspit Gremlin
data.oracle_text:
{1}, {T}: Blisterspit Gremlin deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Blisterspit Gremlin.
data.flavor_text:
"Ah, we have a critic."
—Orthion, Lavabrink captain

data.name: Bloodcrazed Goblin
data.oracle_text: Bloodcrazed Goblin can't attack unless an opponent has been dealt damage this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"A single drop of blood draws their attention, then they strip your bones clean before you have time to die."
—Jamias, hermit of Telfer Peak

data.name: Bloodfire Dwarf
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: It deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

data.name: Bloodhall Ooze
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
data.flavor_text: A drop of blood spilled from the first dragon.

data.name: Bloodlust Inciter
data.oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "To victory! To glory! To eternity!"

data.name: Bloodshed Fever
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.
data.flavor_text: Cinder mages enjoy seeing their victims in the throes of bloodlust—and seeing the regret that inevitably follows.

data.name: Boggart Forager
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Boggart Forager: Target player shuffles their library.
data.flavor_text:
"Reach in this hole, lose a hand. Reach in that hole, find a sparkly."
—Auntie wisdom

data.name: Bold Impaler
data.oracle_text: {2}{R}: Bold Impaler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Burning with hatred for Nahiri, the Voldaren and Markov forces assaulted the warped Markov Manor with a collective fury not seen in centuries.

data.name: Bonfire of the Damned
data.oracle_text:
Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
Miracle {X}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

data.name: Boots of Speed
data.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
data.flavor_text: Click your heels and become the wind.

data.name: Boros Recruit
data.oracle_text:
({R/W} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.)
First strike
data.flavor_text:
"Look at this goblin, once wild, untamed, and full of idiocy. The Boros have given him the skill of a soldier and focused his heart with a single cause."
—Razia

data.name: Borrowed Hostility
data.oracle_text:
Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

data.name: Brand
data.oracle_text:
Gain control of all permanents you own. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text:
"By this glyph I affirm your role."
—Urza, to Karn

data.name: Branded Brawlers
data.oracle_text:
Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
data.flavor_text:
"The sword or the lash. Choose."
—Akul, Keldon whip sergeant

data.name: Brightstone Ritual
data.oracle_text: Add {R} for each Goblin on the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: Wizards fought over the stone to exploit its power. Goblins fight over it because it's shiny.

data.name: Brutal Suppression
data.oracle_text: Activated abilities of nontoken Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to activate.
data.flavor_text:
"They no longer care about their own suffering. Show them something worse."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

data.name: Brute Force
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

data.name: Builder's Bane
data.oracle_text: Destroy X target artifacts. Builder's Bane deals damage to each player equal to the number of artifacts they controlled that were put into a graveyard this way.
data.flavor_text: There is only so much a person may be buried with.

data.name: Built to Smash
data.oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Free from Consulate regulations, renegade-built automatons push performance to the limit.

data.name: Bull Rush
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "It's gone mad! Loose the chains and save what you can!"

data.name: Burn from Within
data.oracle_text: Burn from Within deals X damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

data.name: Burning Cloak
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

data.name: Burning Inquiry
data.oracle_text: Each player draws three cards, then discards three cards at random.
data.flavor_text: Jariad burned the midnight oil, burned through scroll after scroll, and then burned down his laboratory.

data.name: Burrowing
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

data.name: Burst Lightning
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

data.name: Burst of Speed
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. (They can attack and {T} even if they just came under your control.)
data.flavor_text: Great generals inspire by example. Goblin chieftains inspire by electrifying the barracks.

data.name: By Force
data.oracle_text: Destroy X target artifacts.
data.flavor_text:
"Dissent? Your gods can't even begin to comprehend the dissent that's about to happen here!"
—Chandra Nalaar

data.name: Cartouche of Zeal
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Zeal enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
data.flavor_text: The fifth cartouche is the final affirmation of glory, granted only to the worthy dead.

data.name: Chain Lightning
data.oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

data.name: Chandra's Defeat
data.oracle_text: Chandra's Defeat deals 5 damage to target red creature or red planeswalker. If that permanent is a Chandra planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Fire? Is that your only trick, Chandra?"
—Nicol Bolas

data.name: Chaos Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Wall.
• Chaos Charm deals 1 damage to target creature.
• Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

data.name: Chaoslace
data.oracle_text: Target spell or permanent becomes red. (Its mana symbols remain unchanged.)

data.name: Cinder Wall
data.oracle_text:
Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
data.flavor_text:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
—Onean sergeant

data.name: Claim the Firstborn
data.oracle_text: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"The deal was struck and the favor had been done. And so, under the cover of night, the debt was paid."
—*Tales of the Fae*

data.name: Clear a Path
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with defender.
data.flavor_text: "Why do guards always look surprised when we bash them?" asked Ruric. "I think they expect a bribe," said Thar.

data.name: Clout of the Dominus
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has haste.

data.name: Collateral Damage
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Collateral Damage deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: It is much easier to create fire than to contain it.

data.name: Conflagrate
data.oracle_text:
Conflagrate deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
Flashback—{R}{R}, Discard X cards. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Consuming Fervor
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on this creature."
data.flavor_text: Headlong is the only way to pass through the gate to the afterlife.

data.name: Coordinated Assault
data.oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

data.name: Crackling Club
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
Sacrifice Crackling Club: It deals 1 damage to target creature.
data.flavor_text: It adds injury to injury.

data.name: Crack the Earth
data.oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a permanent.
data.flavor_text:
"As the war progressed, the destruction the kami caused became more widespread and less predictable."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

data.name: Crash Through
data.oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

data.name: Crater's Claws
data.oracle_text:
Crater's Claws deals X damage to any target.
Ferocious — Crater's Claws deals X plus 2 damage instead if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

data.name: Crazed Goblin
data.oracle_text: Crazed Goblin attacks each combat if able.
data.flavor_text: Because fighting is easier than figuring out what else to do.

data.name: Crimson Wisps
data.oracle_text:
Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: The whispers are incomprehensible, yet cinders always hear a message of urgency.

data.name: Crowd's Favor
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

data.name: Crown of Flames
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"All my life I've fought these monsters. Today I finish that fight."
—Barrin

data.name: Crush
data.oracle_text: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
data.flavor_text: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

data.name: Curse of Opulence
data.oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
data.flavor_text: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

data.name: Daring Buccaneer
data.oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.
data.flavor_text: No ancient lore ties the pirates of the Brazen Coalition to the Immortal Sun. But it's a powerful ancient artifact in a city of gold—what's not to covet?

data.name: Death Spark
data.oracle_text:
Death Spark deals 1 damage to any target.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

data.name: Deface
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature with defender.
data.flavor_text:
"Leave no stone unturned."
—Ruric Thar

data.name: Demonfire
data.oracle_text:
Demonfire deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
data.set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Jace vs. Chandra

data.name: Desperate Gambit
data.oracle_text: Choose a source you control and flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that source would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

data.name: Detonate
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact with mana value X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

data.name: Devastating Summons
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X lands.
Create two X/X red Elemental creature tokens.
data.flavor_text: Things born in magma are always angry.

data.name: Devil's Play
data.oracle_text:
Devil's Play deals X damage to any target.
Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: A devil's hands are never idle.

data.name: Disintegrate
data.oracle_text: Disintegrate deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

data.name: Dizzying Gaze
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
{R}: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"When I cut down my angel I only started my fall."
—Crovax

data.name: Dragon Mantle
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

data.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

data.name: Dragon's Herald
data.oracle_text: {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a black creature, a red creature, and a green creature: Search your library for a card named Hellkite Overlord, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
data.flavor_text: The penultimate step of the ritual involves bathing in a delicious glaze.

data.name: Dragon's Rage Channeler
data.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
Delirium — As long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Dragon's Rage Channeler gets +2/+2, has flying, and attacks each combat if able.

data.name: Dual Shot
data.oracle_text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
data.flavor_text: "Through me the rage of Tilonalli burns twice as bright."

data.name: Duct Crawler
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}: Target creature can't block Duct Crawler this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Boss told us to try and train 'em. Trained it to attack—it ate Flugg. Trained it to run fast—it got away. Success!"
—Dlig, goblin spelunker

data.name: Dueling Rapier
data.oracle_text:
Flash
When Dueling Rapier enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

data.name: Duergar Assailant
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice Duergar Assailant: It deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
data.flavor_text: Some duergars dismiss the world above as a fable. They react violently when their comfortable illusions are dispelled.

data.name: Dust Corona
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"They infiltrated deep into the enemy camp under cover of darkness . . . and dirt."
—Corus, viashino warrior

data.name: Dwarven Armorer
data.oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a +0/+1 counter or a +1/+0 counter on target creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The few remaining pieces from this period suggest the Dwarves eventually made weapons and armor out of everything, even children's toys."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

data.name: Dwarven Catapult
data.oracle_text: Dwarven Catapult deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among all creatures target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text:
"Often greatly outnumbered in battle, dwarves relied on catapults as one means of damaging a large army."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

data.name: Dwarven Grunt
data.oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
data.flavor_text:
Hard as stone and twice as stubborn.
—Dwarven compliment

data.name: Dwarven Pony
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}, {T}: Target Dwarf creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
data.flavor_text:
"I hear Halina's got a pony that can count to six—and likes to eat meat."
—Chandler

data.name: Dwarven Scorcher
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to them.
data.flavor_text: Barbarians invented the blaze of glory. Dwarves perfected it.

data.name: Dwarven Song
data.oracle_text: One or more target creatures become red until end of turn.

data.name: Dwarven Trader
data.flavor_text:
"Their definition of 'fair profit' is certainly novel."
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

data.name: Dynacharge
data.oracle_text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
data.flavor_text: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

data.name: Earthbind
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Earthbind enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature has flying, Earthbind deals 2 damage to that creature and Earthbind gains "Enchanted creature loses flying."

data.name: Earthquake
data.oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
data.flavor_text: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.

data.name: Electrickery
data.oracle_text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

data.name: Electrostatic Bolt
data.oracle_text: Electrostatic Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature. If it's an artifact creature, Electrostatic Bolt deals 4 damage to it instead.
data.flavor_text: It's hard to avoid electric shock when the entire plane is metallic.

data.name: End the Festivities
data.oracle_text: End the Festivities deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.
data.flavor_text: When the defenses around Lurenbraum Fortress faltered, the Crimson Ballroom received some unexpected guests.

data.name: Engulfing Flames
data.oracle_text:
Engulfing Flames deals 1 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Enrage
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The barbarians call it "touching the soul of the dragon."

data.name: Enslaved Dwarf
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Enslaved Dwarf: Target black creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Captive dwarves always regain their freedom, either through escape or through a desperate, fiery death.

data.name: Epiphany Storm
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."
data.flavor_text: In Meletis, certain oracles are trained to be divine lightning rods, receiving countless visions in an instant.

data.name: Escape Velocity
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Escape—{1}{R}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
data.flavor_text: "Not even death can catch me now!"

data.name: Eternal Warrior
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance.
data.flavor_text: Warriors of the Tsunami-nito School spend years in training to master the way of effortless effort.

data.name: Expedite
data.oracle_text:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "I run, and thunder follows."

data.name: Faithless Looting
data.oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Falkenrath Gorger
data.oracle_text: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Falkenrath Pit Fighter
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}, Discard a card, Sacrifice a Vampire: Draw two cards. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn.
data.flavor_text: In the arena, vampires set aside all pretense of honor or civilization and fight like the predators they know themselves to be.

data.name: Fall of the Titans
data.oracle_text:
Surge {X}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Fall of the Titans deals X damage to each of up to two targets.
data.flavor_text: As Gideon kept the brood lineages at bay, Chandra incinerated the bound Eldrazi titans.

data.name: False Orders
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step.
Remove target creature defending player controls from combat. Creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only that creature this combat become unblocked. You may have it block an attacking creature of your choice.

data.name: Fanatical Firebrand
data.oracle_text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

data.name: Fearless Pup
data.oracle_text:
First strike
Boast — {2}{R}: Fearless Pup gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
data.flavor_text: "Awooo!"

data.name: Feint
data.oracle_text: Tap all creatures blocking target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by that creature and each creature blocking it.

data.name: Fervent Champion
data.oracle_text:
First strike, haste
Whenever Fervent Champion attacks, another target attacking Knight you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Equip abilities you activate that target Fervent Champion cost {3} less to activate.

data.name: Fervent Strike
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"The flame paints a bright wheel on the sky, then shifts into a stabbing spark. The enemy falls; the smoke of victory rises."
—"Legends of the Firedancer"

data.name: Fever Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

data.name: Fiery Impulse
data.oracle_text:
Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage instead.
data.flavor_text: "Well, this got out of hand."

data.name: Fighting Chance
data.oracle_text: For each blocking creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn.
data.flavor_text: A stroke of luck can smite an army.

data.name: Figure of Destiny
data.oracle_text:
{R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

data.name: Fireball
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.
data.flavor_text: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

data.name: Fireblade Charger
data.oracle_text:
As long as Fireblade Charger is equipped, it has haste.
When Fireblade Charger dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
data.flavor_text: "Down in flames" isn't a destination, but a journey.

data.name: Firebolt
data.oracle_text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.

data.flavor_text: "There's more where that came from!"

data.name: Fire Bowman

data.name: Firebreathing
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Whenever Firedrinker Satyr is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

data.name: Firefright Mage

Menace
{7}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Shrine Keeper: It deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
data.flavor_text: Though grimed with the dust of centuries, the ancient shrine was not unguarded.

{1}: Flailing Soldier gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

data.name: Foundry Street Denizen

data.name: Frenzied Goblin
data.oracle_text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
data.flavor_text: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.
